name: Catacomb Cleaner
description: Catacomb Cleaner is a platformer focused on boss battles. This Indiana Jones themed adventure comes with the full archaeological setup, except your adventurer doesn't fear snakes, he fears germs. Help evict troublesome monsters from your treasure hunting spot and get some loot while you're at it. Overcome the mess, and in the end you'll kill the bosses and some germs while you're at it.
